## Activity 2: Survivor 21 Flags Challenge

{{< video https://youtu.be/aonCsvi0LKc width="800" height="600" >}}

### [Rules of the game](https://survivor-org.fandom.com/wiki/21_Flags):

Two teams take turns removing either 1, 2, or 3 flags at a time from a total of 21.
The team to take the last flag(s) wins the challenge and is granted immunity.
